description: Change to authentication method could be an indicated of an attacker adding an auth method to the account so they can have continued access. Author: AlertIQ. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Change to Authentication Method
query: (LoggedByService:"Authentication\ Methods" AND Category:"UserManagement" AND OperationName:"User\ registered\ security\ info")
